select * from members where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by user_regidate desc
mapper.insert: insert into admin (admin_id, admin_pass, admin_name, admin_phone) values (#{admin_id}, #{admin_pass}, #{admin_name}, #{admin_phone})
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_pass, admin_name, admin_phone, TO_CHAR(admin_regidate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as admin_regidate from admin order by admin_regidate desc
select * from admin where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by admin_regidate desc
